Match groups of flowers to prevent them from overgrowing in this fast-paced puzzle game!

Bloom was made as part of the gamejam, a game by its cover 2018. it is based on the famicase entry of the same name, designed by richard perez of skinny ships.

It is a match-3 game with flowers created over time on random stems, indicated by a loading loop. Matches work horizontally using the color, shape or pattern of the flowers and the stems can be raised and lowered or have their places swapped.

description: Code Dungeon is a short atmospheric dungeon crawler hack-n-slash game where you fight your way up a tower through hordes of enemies. Designed to be accessible to people with low vision or no vision.

name: Pandemic of the Forgotten Virus
description: Pandemic of the Forgotten Virus is a local multiplayer bullet hell shooter game where 2 players can compete with each other or an AI to try and defeat each other and reach the stratosphere. This game is heavily inspired by both phantasmagoria Touhou games, but the catch is that we are using a neural network for our AI with genetic algorithm unlike conventional means. The player plays as the shrine maiden Megu or witch Kiara against another player or an AI, hereafter referred as “rival”, with the objective of shooting down enemies while dodging bullets, the player gets points as they defeat enemies which they can exchange to use their ultimate ability to make the game harder for their rival by spawning bullets and other enemies on their screen.

name: Lampyridae Matsuri
description: Help Wriggle save the Summer festival!

name: Sequoia
description: Avoid the gigant random stuff using your spaceship!

name: Little Heroine Playset
description: Little Heroine Playset is a Touhou Project fangame.

name: More of a Kind
description: A 3D puzzle platformer where you help the Flandres get to the goal. But their number keep on increasing. Move multiple Flandres at the same time using ASWD keys. If one of your Flandres falls, you lose the game. You can also use the left and right arrows to orbit the camera (sometime looking at a different angle is the key to solving a puzzle).

name: Super Ninja Noodle Chef
description: What's better than a normal, common chef? What's cooler than a normal Ninja? A Super Ninja Noodle Chef! Swing around the environment, run, jump and get the keys to advance in your ninja training and make long noodles by swinging in them, but be careful if you do it too long, you will have to make a new noodle.

name: Space Danger: G.O.N.
description: Intergalactic awesomeness...... Exploring, missions (well.........just 2 missions), shedloads of pew-pew, 3 different guns, 4 different races and etc....

name: Oink Royale
description: Bankrupt the evil piggy banks!

name: Crossroads of Fate
description: Experience the game through eleven different heroes: Powerhouse, Wildcard, The Showoff, Paladin and many more with their unique strengths and special moves! Customize, level up and equip your hero with a massive array of options and skill charts as you delve into the mysteries. With hundreds of side quests and adventures, the story and challenges never end. Discover new items and rewards as you dive into the mysteries of Ur.

name: Unicellular
description: A relaxing game about growth and evolution

name: Building 37
description: A Noir Investigation

name: Volcano Snek
description: A short snake-like metroidvania

name: According to Plan
description: A crazy bank heist shooting game where you play as a robber and his crew.

name: Jeam's Big Day
description: A slime rewinds some ropes

name: SlimeTrials
description: Action Platforming Clean-Em-Up featuring a Slimegirl

name: Slimoid
description: Help the Slimoid to find his brothers or Mom will absorb him !

name: Candle Prick
description: Puzzle game about using your enemies as extensions of yourself

name: We Need the Sun
description: You need to reach the sun... Explore 16 randomly appearing levels on a quest to reach the sun, racking up scores through collecting coins... One problem though, you can only move by jumping. That means only one method of transport and one goal.

name: EatToFight
description: Sin descripción

name: Rotato Ship
description: A Rotating Platformer with a Time Limit

name: Ambrosia's
description: Bestie/Girlfriend Simulator and real-time Mystery? Let her take care of you while gathering clues!

name: Luckier
description: Play a lucky black cat in this time-based JRPG with a turn-based battle system.

name: Lifo
description: A dynamic puzzle game!

name: Your Blue Room
description: A real-time based horror game.

name: Encyclopedia Explosica
description: Blow-up inferior players through the power of your knowledge (before they blow you up first).

name: Tiny Pixel Wars
description: A tiny real-time strategy game with fast gameplay.

name: Slime on Hole
description: A slime being throw in a hole, trying to dodge obstacles to see how far you get.

name: Chronomina
description: Time is running out, you must manage your time carefully while complete your duties.

name: An Aware Guy in the Past
description: Welcome to the future! Our civilization has advanced to a new stage in evolution! Cars now fly and houses look like UFOs! It's amazing! But also very boring... that's why you go back to the past because life was just better back then. But of course, with you comes all the knowledge of your time, and it may have some consequences...

name: The Morphine Western Revenge
description: The Morphine Western Revenge is a Western top-down shooter with a focus on fast-paced, decisive, and tactical combat. You play as a young Native American woman in search of her sister, who went missing in the aftermath of your tribe's destruction at the hands of the military. Your only companions are the gun at your hip and a hypodermic needle full of morphine.

name: Ovus Nova
description: DUPLICATE or DETONATE! A unique singleplayer strategy game.

name: Freaky Fish DX
description:
Skeeter the fisherman has found a large stash of dynamite in his Uncle Cletus’s shed and has decided to use it for his new hobby of "blast fishing”, which involves using explosives to stun the fish in the lake for easy collection.

The local fish are not happy with Skeeters destructive new hobby and so Jacques le Shark, a rarely seen fish with the ability to blow giant bubbles has come out of retirement to deal with the problem…

name: The Silence
description: A walking simulator based on its creator's experience of childhood abuse.

name: The Furniture of Self
description:
The Furniture of Self is an autobiographical VR game about identity and self. Explore my room, create your identity and find out about my own.

This game is the product of a year of studying the topics identity and self. It tries to visualize the process of building ones own identity and exploring a given identity.

Everything you touch will become a part of your self and you cannot let go anymore. Your body is not able to interact with the surrounding, only your identity can do so.

While exploring the room and its contents stories about myself will be unlocked, which are attached to the items in the room.

name: Wildland: Initial Attack
description: Stamp out fires with your friends using planes, helicopters, and your hands in a huge beautiful world. Customize your character. Play online or LAN. Save towns, people, animals, and the forest. Build your base to get better tools and vehicles. Jump into the fiery abyss as a smokejumper and see if you can survive!

name: An Ode to Todd the Toad: Frogcare!
description:
Be a frog mom! Play with your frogs in the nest mode. Name them, give them outfits, and let them play with the toys they found!

Protect your frogs in The Maze! With 1 or 2 players on keyboard, or a bunch of players on gamepad, smack away the wasps while your frogs eat flies. Don't let the wasps get to them!

name: Sextris
description: Sextris is a bootleg adult Columns clone for the Super Famicom.

name: Sam & Max: Beyond Time and Space
description: The Freelance Police are back on the crime beat in a newly remastered version of their second episodic season. Zombies will dance. Mariachis will sing. A giant battle robot will trash the streets. And when their friends’ lives are at stake, Sam & Max will risk their very souls to set things right.

name: Love Delivery
description: This games is about starting a relationship while working delivery job!

name: Quest for the Code
description: STARBRIGHT Asthma CD-ROM Game: Quest for the Code is an interactive asthma adventure game developed by Starbright.

name: Theme Hotel
description: The goal is to leave customers satisfied and reach the five stars as soon as possible.

name: Uni Ver Se
description: Sin descripción

name: The Slaverian Trucker
description: The Slaverian Trucker is a Survival/Truck/Life simulator game. Make enough money to survive and expand your wealth in the harsh semi-post apocalyptic lands of Slaveria, doing legal and illegal work, while maintaining, fixing, building, repairing, tuning your trucks, cars and other vehicles.

name: Rocket Factory
description: The player has the ability to create a rocket by defining the nose, fins, payload, and engine of their rocket. They can even create a custom paint job. The rocket can then be launched to determine its maximum altitude. There is also an option called Cloud Chaser, where the player is given a desired height for their rocket's trajectory, and they must try to create a rocket that meets this requirement. Bonus points are awarded based upon the payload attached.

name: Godfall: Challenger Edition
description: Instantly unleash Godfall’s power! Godfall Challenger Edition immediately unlocks a maximum level Valorplate, spoils you with skill points, and equips you with a spread of deadly weapons. Challenge all three end-game modes Lightbringer, Dreamstones, and the Ascended Tower of Trials. Vanquish your enemies and be rewarded with loot worthy of a true Valorian. Loot and slash in up to 3-player matchmade co-op to show your skill, perfect your build, and smash your enemies.

name: Twitter Island
description:
Find yourself or make new friends as you explore an island filled with 10,000 birds.

A short project by Daniel Linssen to celebrate reaching 10,000 Twitter followers and to say thank you very much to all of them.

name: Afterimage
description: Reveal the hidden secrets of a fantasy land in Afterimage! Explore the magnificent landscapes and ruins of an ancient metropolis, meeting mysterious colossal beings and adorable roaming spirits along the way. The thrilling adventure of this marvelous 2D hand-drawn world awaits you!

name: Tales of Shadowland
description:
Explore a thrilling wide world full of adventure and danger. Gather materials, craft your weapons, improve your skills and conquer your enemies with a non-target realtime classless combat system, challenging monsters with player-driven economy. Tales of Shadowland is a medieval fantasy MMORPG with open PvP and PvE combat.
Get along with your friends and create a brand new adventure in this universe of mysteries.

name: 6 Degrees of Sabotage
description:
One hour ago, a bomb exploded at the mayor's rally.

We have gathered intelligence that implicates the Clockmaker as the mastermind behind the attack. However, the Gambler was seen placing the bomb at the rally. We believe the Clockmaker does not personally know the Gambler.

There is a network of saboteurs disguised among groups of innocent citizens. Bomb instructions were passed between multiple pairs of saboteur acquaintances.

Review the security tapes from today to track the note and uncover the saboteurs.

name: The Sea Has No Claim
description:
1 Wreck - 10 People - 502 km of ocean
1 Wreck - 20 People - 982 km of ocean
2 Wrecks - 100 People - 2002 km of ocean
3 Wrecks - 180 People - 4502 km of ocean
1 Wreck - 45 People - 6482 km of ocean
3 Wrecks - 300 People - 12502 km of ocean
2 Wrecks - 80 People - 18002 km of ocean
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 29. Developed in 48 hours for the theme 'Beneath the surface'.

name: Unsolicited
description: Make the Acme Form-letter company stand out as the premier form-letter mailing service on earth.

name: Strip Fighter 5: Chimpocon Edition
description: 22 eccentric fighters battle for supremacy in a mysterious underground fighting competition! Brimming with tongue-in-cheek humor, excess violence, and wanton titillation...re-experience a classic age of gaming with this love filled tribute to hardcore fans of 90's era 2D fighting games!

name: Lost Alone EP.1: Little Sister
description: Growing up with his paternal grandmother after his father was arrested for murdering his mother, George emerges from the spiral of alcohol addiction by meeting his fiancée Hanna. But his childhood traumas will soon return to haunt him, pushing him into the abyss of despair.

name: 4-Lung Boy
description:
A week after moving to a small town, you are confronted by frustration, an astronaut, and striped siblings...

4-Lung Boy is a short point & click adventure story, designed and illustrated by Anatola Howard (maroonracoon) & put into motion by denzquix

name: This Panda Needs You
description: Help panda re-stack her building blocks blown over by the wind with your block stacking and problem solving!

name: Fat Slice 2
description: Slice up shapes with your mouse or finger, reach the goal size, avoid bouncing balls, bombs and impenetrable walls. Better your score and earn achievements.

name: Doorways
description: Rescue your kitten from an alien force by travelling through portals masked as green doorways. What lies ahead for our hero? Probably not much good, although that might be up to you.

name: Pixel Driver
description: Pixel Driver is a casual infinite driving game where you race in heavy traffic at high speeds. Crashing into cars is AWESOME since they actually break up into parts which let's you cause proper havoc!

name: B.A.T.
description:
You've just been hired as a part time night shift worker at a local conservatory for bats. The conservatory is equipped with state of the art technology that allows for communication between humans and bats! Your job is to watch over them from midnight to six, and make sure they are given food and water and are played with. If you keep them happy, things just might go well for you! And if not... well, who knows what such creatures of the night might be planning...

B.A.T. is a short simulation visual novel about cute bats, a part time worker, and other things that go bump in the night! Inspired in part by Hatoful Boyfriend.

name: Cloud Serpent
description: An easy-to-learn puzzle game where you can't stop moving. Collect all the orbs and get to the exit without crashing into anything. Wrap around the map to get to hard-to-reach locations and discover new challenges in each zone.

name: Team Hogus: GHAMEMFAIFTH OTHIYLTIM
description: Team Hogus is a minigame compilation where you go through a series of short minigames that go over a story-line styled after a cheesy action movie. Play as both heroes and villains through a variety of tasks, from tasks as cool as blasting away at robots to tasks as mundane as stirring a cup of coffee.

name: Regular Show: Battle of the Behemoths
description: Battle of the Behemoths is an all-out duel of destruction between Regular Show's most colossal characters. Go one vs. one against gigantic warriors like Baby Ducks, Evil Geese, Guardian of Secrets, VCR-bitrator, Snowballs and the Warlock. Each character has an arsenal of kicks, punches and unique special moves to take down your opponent.

name: Regular Show: Paint War
description: Embark on a real Paintball war with Mordecai and Rigby characters from Regular Show. Choose your favorite character and complete different missions around the map to win the war against the enemy. Use the coins you earn to buy new equipment!

name: Regular Show: Fist Punch
description:
Mordecai and Rigby decided to spend the day at the coffee shop, drinking coffee all day, eating, and having fun. Unfortunately, they cannot enjoy today very much because an evil character, whose nickname is Night Owl, kidnapped their friend.

They cannot stay and watch how this happens, so they decided to become superheroes and save their friend. In the end, we think that each one of us would do anything to help a good friend if we were in their place. So help Mordecai and Rigby to beat the Night Owl crew and rescue your friend.

name: Dungeon Universe
description: Dungeon Universe is an upcoming fantasy MMORPG where players connect their gaming enthusiasm with latest blockchain technology. It's an open seamless world that allows for endless possibilities. You can explore the world, participate in trading, complete dungeons, quest and much more.

name: Lost Bubbles: Sweet Mates
description: Control the soap, move, and dash to get to the soap holder. However, each time the soap is moved, its durability is reduced by friction with the floor. Please reach the soap holder before it loses its durability.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris for Wonderswan Color is the first Tetris Guideline compatible game in Japan. Tetris is one of the great many versions of the famous soviet block-stacking game. Pieces made up of four blocks (dubbed "tetriminoes") fall into a 10x20 square well, and must be arranged into complete lines, which then vanish and clear more space on the board. As lines are cleared, the game speed increases until either the tetriminoes reach the top of the well or the player completes the goal for the current mode.

name: The Invisible Guardian
description: The Invisible Guardian is a live-action interactive video experience, take part in the spy wars during the troubled times of the Chinese resistance war against Japan. Gain insight, turn the tide, and your choices will give birth to hundreds of life and death stories!

name: Be Like Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures
description:
Be Like Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures is a Flash game developed in 2014. The game is a very low-budget and rather poor quality version of Pac-Man. The game uses the traditional Pac-Man formula, but has a strange, non-linear maze design with many dead ends.

The game it was created for TeleToon+, the TV channel that broadcasted Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures in Poland

name: Drink Beer, Neglect Family
description:
You are a disillusioned father who spends most of his time drinking beer and avoiding his family. How long can you avoid them, and at what cost?

Every beer you drink increases your score, and applies a negative effect. Some beers make you unable to jump, some make you fall off of bridges, some make you throw up every few seconds, and so on. On top of that, pictures of your family pop up everywhere, and you need to avoid them, lest you are reminded of your duties as a father and a husband.

name: BBQ Simulator: The Squad
description: BBQ Simulator lets you experience what barbecue means which that most of the time messy ways. You have to feed your friends with well cooked meats before they pass out from hunger. You can play all the experiences with up to 8 friends in multiplayer mode or single player mode.

name: Garden
description: They came across a ghost with a dream like their own.

name: Warcos
description:
Warcos is an excellent real-time tactical command shooter game. Choose whom you want to be a SWAT soldier or Cartel member. Win fights, eliminate opponents, earn game money, increase your level and customize your equipment.
Play online with thousands of players in this multiplayer first-person shooter game as a solo or together with friends.
Plunge into the world of battles and victories. Assemble your team and fight till the end. Enjoy the game and improve your skills.

name: Iwatobi Penguin Rocky x Hopper
description: Enjoy party games with the brother penguins Rocky & Hopper. Norinori Classics Super 70's dance music BGM to six! If you choose Raburabumodo, with a multi-tap controller in two pieces at a time up to four people can play!

name: Iwatobi Penguin Rocky x Hopper 2: Tantei Monogatari
description: Rocky Hopper has a detective with him! The definitive party game to enjoy 12 games. Story mode challenges you to play alone! Let's play party games with friends!

name: Cat Box Paradox
description: A fast paced retro platform game, you must think fast as you run, jump and swap colour, making your way through 8 floors of challenging and amusing colour changing mayhem.

name: Plague
description: Sin descripción

name: Zen Match
description: A nature inspired match-3 game with relaxing music. Unlock tiles and backgrounds as you progress. Also collect tokens to decorate rooms and create your own zen spaces.

name: Skeal
description: A short skiing game that features Seal, pleasure, and pain.

name: Feminize Me!
description:
Feminize Me! is an adult transformation puzzle game. Funded via Patreon and inspired by EYEZMAZE's GROW games, it tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to complete the protagonist's transformation into a woman.

The game features 4 endings, 40320 possible combinations, a hint system and a special unlockable mode.

name: Resident Evil: Mortal Night
description: Mortal Night is a mod for Resident Evil 2 Sourcenext that adds a completely new story and radically changes the gameplay by adding new mechanics. The latest version, REbirth edition, is no longer standalone, but it enhances the experience even more and brings you the possibility of playing in areas from other classic Resident Evil titles. Now randomization has been included, which means that items, enemies, door locks and cutscenes will vary (slightly or greatly) every time you start a new playthrough. In addition to this, the order in which you go to the different areas and the choices you make will also affect the story and gameplay. "Replayable" is the perfect adjective for this mod. This is a must-play for any fan of classic Resident Evil games. Right now only the first episode (2-3 hours long) is available for this updated version, but episodes 2 and 3 are being worked on, and they will bring even more novelties.

name: Super Mario Star World
description: Super Mario Star World is an upcoming Super Mario 64 DS ROM hack/mod, developed by SKELUX, and the sequel to the famous Super Mario 64 mod Super Mario Star Road.

name: Molly and the Gunmids
description: A shoot 'em up / adventure full of drawings and sounds. There's one sound that's really annoying at one point, and that is the best sound in the game. Some of the drawings look as if they were drawn by a 1 year old baby. You can even explore a solar system and read a tiny book while fighting a sun demon.

name: Small Army
description: Its an FPS adventure game, with semi open world, where u take a control of Cobi soldier figurine. This game was supplied with Cobi Bricks.

name: Sengoku Rance: Limited Edition
description:
The limited edition comes with:
- Special Box Case
- 80 Page Manual Booklet
- Reversible DVD cover case
- Sengoku Rance game DVD
- Sengoku Rance OST CD
- Sengoku Rance Digital download card
- Kenshin Acrylic Keychain

name: Made of DIrt
description: I continue living this cyclical quiet life, but these strange yet familiar dreams of mine keep appearing...

name: Endless Martian Pit
description: a game made in Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

name: Surge Breaker
description: How quickly can you obliterate the crawler menace in this top-down action-strategy hybrid?

name: Ruler of the Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Tank Rumble
description:
Super Tank Rumble is a sandbox strategy game where a player assembles their tank with various Blocks and plays 1 vs 1 against other user-built tanks.
If a player destroys the other player’s tank, the player wins the battle.
Increasing the player’s level by winning battles unlocks new Blocks to use for their tanks. Opening Supply Boxes rewards the player with Research Documents that can be used to upgrade Blocks or to unlock new Blocks. As a player wins more battles their ranking will rise, allowing them to climb to the top of the ladder and become a legendary tank captain.
A player can also make Blueprints of their original tank creations and share them with other players to download and use. They can show them off on social media as well.

name: Patchworkz!: X-maz!
description: Christmas themed mosaic and pattern learning game. Every patterned piece of cloth has its perfect place in these quilt art pictures. Piece together all colorful patches to solve increasingly challenging puzzles. It has a competitive mode where you must solve the pattern before your opponent.

name: Bimbo Sequencer 2
description:
Bimbo Sequencer 2 is an adult transformation puzzle game. Funded via Patreon and inspired by EYEZMAZE's GROW games, it tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to transform the protagonist into a bimbo.

Will you unlock the perfect bimbo or will you turn her into something else...?

name: Witch Sequencer
description: Witch Sequencer is an adult transformation puzzle game. It tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to complete the protagonist's infernal transformation.

name: Necessary Bimbos
description:
Necessary Bimbos is an illustrated branching story written by Limerick and illustrated/coded by Sortimid.

The game follows about a young guy who wakes up with a headache after a fight with his girlfriend. While trying to smooth things over, he keeps inadvertently changing reality --- her background, clothes, even how the world works!

How far will he go?

You get to decide!

There are twelve different endings and over 60 illustrations covering 38,000 words!

name: King of the Dwarves: Underground City Builder
description: Build an epic kingdom inside a mountain in this underground city builder. Mine and build in a vast procedurally generated 3D world. Gather resources, research technology, train warriors and engineers, forge weapons, fight monsters and manage hundreds of units. Become the King of the Dwarves!

name: Mummy Madness
description: Help the mummy get his head back to the sarcophagus. Click and drag your mouse to aim and release your shot. Collect all the coins, and watch out for obstacles.

name: The Wreck
description: The Wreck is a mature 3D visual novel about sisterhood, motherhood, grief and survival. Follow failed screenwriter Junon as she attempts to make it through the most pivotal day in her life. Relive the past, alter the present, and embrace the future - or watch Junon's story end in a wreck.

name: Ryan's Rescue Squad
description: Rescue Ryan’s friends from Dark Titan and his evil allies! Explore four worlds packed with slime, hilarious characters, and unlockable costumes on an unforgettable platforming adventure!

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Dawn of Ragnarök
description: In the most ambitious expansion in franchise history, Eivor must embrace their destiny as Odin, the Norse god of Battle and Wisdom. Unleash new divine powers as you embark on a desperate quest through a breathtaking world. Complete a legendary Viking saga and save your son in the face of the gods’ doom.

name: 8 Bit Armies: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Musicus!
description: Musicus! is a port for the story-rich visual novel Musicus!, that tells a story of the struggle to fit society's mold while living for ourselves.

name: Musicus!: Limited Edition
description:
Musicus! is a port for the story-rich visual novel Musicus!, that tells a story of the struggle to fit society's mold while living for ourselves.

Musicus! Limited Edition includes the following:
- Musicus!
- B2 Tapestry
- Dr. Flower Maxi-Single "Vintage Memories"

name: Gal Gun: Double Peace
description: The Gal*Gun series is centered around a protagonist who becomes Super Popular under bewildering circumstances, forcing him to fend off hordes of girls who want to confess their love to him! Using his special Pheromone Shot, he must take aim and fire at the approaching ladies to send them into states of euphoria! Meanwhile, he must confess his love to one of the beautiful heroines in this part-shooting game, part-dating sim series!

name: Let's Sing 2022 with German Hits: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocket Bot Royale
description: A frantic Battle Royale set on a destructible, sinking Island. Fire rockets from your custom robo-tank to eliminate the competition using advanced tactics and powerful weapons.

name: Curious Expedition 2: Highlands of Avalon
description: The Highlands of Avalon DLC features a brand new island type (the Highlands) with new tile types, items, locations, enemies, and recruitable characters. Once the DLC is activated it will expand possibilities across the entire game, both in Campaign Mode and Director Mode.

name: World Turtles
description: A wholesome colony builder where you help Meeps save the life of the World Turtle they live on. Construct buildings, harvest resources, allocate and prioritise tasks, research and develop, and cooperate with other Meeps. And who knows? You may even meet others from different worlds.

name: Squad Battles: First World War
description: Squad Battles: First World War allows you to experience the technical and tactical advancements of that conflict, and the terrible battles that were carried out. Can you survive the horrific campaigns of the First World War?

name: Babble Royale
description: Babble Royale is an intense multiplayer free-for-all that combines word-making skill with fast-paced tactical and strategic action. Earn money and collect loot to upgrade your abilities, outrun the deadly hot zone, and outwit or outlast all your opponents to have the Last Word!

name: Final Lap 2000
description:
Final Lap 2000 is the first hand-held incarnation of Namco's Final Lap racing games. That "Final Lap", which is a perfect fusion of the fun of a racing game and the online competition, will appear in WonderSwan with various new elements. With the communication battle function that can be performed in real time, the beautiful race screen, the power change depending on the position, etc., it is a work that makes you think that "Final Lap" is well reproduced on a handheld game machine.
Also, in addition to the original new modes of WonderSwan version such as world tour mode and time trial mode, it is also equipped with a course edit function that allows you to freely create courses, and you can also send your own course to your friend's WonderSwan and play.

name: Starry Sky: Autumn Stories
description:
Starry Sky: Autumn Stories is a bundle of both Starry Sky: In Autumn and Starry Sky: After Autumn.

The third of the four Starry Sky games starring the characters from the drama CD's of the same name.

Starry Sky takes place at Seigatsu Gakuen, a school which specializes in horoscopes, astronomy and other related topics. The main characters are all based on horoscopes.

Starry Sky Autumn features Kotarou Hoshizuki (Libra), Naoshi Haruki (Leo) and Iku Mizushima (Gemini).

name: Marimoth
description: Marimoth is a short shoot 'em up that puts in control of a moth whose shots bounce off the walls. Calculate your aim, evade enemy attacks by learning their patterns and collect coins to power up.

name: Juego-Matica
description: Sin descripción

name: Mon Bazou
description: Build your crappy vehicle into a race car, install the parts yourself. Make money by cutting wood, racing at night or delivering pizza. Maybe you want to manage a sugar shack or build yourself a big garage?

name: Average4k
description: Average4k is a Rhythm Game inspired by other four key rhythm games like Stepmania (Etterna), Quaver, and Osu! that allows you to play almost any chart format with your friends in an instant, you'll be able to drag and drop your folders and immediately play with an insanely customizable experience.

name: Papa's Mocharia to Go!
description: Papa's Mocharia To Go! is the fifteenth gameria in the Papa Louie restaurant time-management series, and is also the fifteenth To Go! game.

name: Match Three Pirates II
description: Enjoy the great Match 3 Pirate Adventure. Form groups of three or more crabs, canons, steering wheels, explosives and other pirate items to unlock powerful boosters and complete all level goals. Use the right strategy, earn coins and build your own great theme park on Pirate Island.

name: Asteroids: Recharged
description:
The original space shooter warps to the modern era! Asteroids: Recharged has been reimagined for modern gameplay, with vibrant visuals, powerful new abilities, and another original soundtrack from award-winning video game composer Megan McDuffee.

Asteroids: Recharged creates a familiar, but revitalized and modern challenge to both old school and new high score chasers. And 30 unique and creative challenge levels take the space shooting game play into new territory, complete with local and global leaderboards.

name: The Well Speaks to Me
description:
The Well Speaks To Me is a horror game where a definitely normal girl does chores, lives their daily life and gathers water from a well.

You can't stop her from going insane, but you can enjoy the ride.
You live alone in the forest doing tasks to survive. Turn on the generator, chop the firewood, draw water from the well...

But appearances are deceiving, and not everything is as innocent as it seems. Why don't people really come to the forest? Was your family really killed in an accident? What is that thing outside the window? What really happened in the well?

Some of these questions will be answered. Some of them won't. But one thing's for sure: something's very wrong. And you're running out of time.

name: Scrapland Remastered
description: The cult game that marked MercurySteam's origins returns; a sci-fi adventure with memorable characters, powerful ships and humor! Enjoy intense Multiplayer battles and races with ships you build.

name: AiliA
description:
Ailia gets lost in a mysterious world.

She has no special power but going into the mirror and walking on the reflections.

Traveling through the maze, playing with reflections, revealing her past with the help of the mirror, her only friend in this world.

Try to use your understanding of mirror reflections to solve the puzzles and help Ailia find her way home.

AiliA is a tricky puzzle game where mirror reflections are made real. Manipulate mirrors and guide Ail through a stunning, reflected world to save her long lost "twin sister" Lia, who was captured inside a mirror.

name: The Shore VR
description:
The Shore VR is a first-person story-driven game with an atmospheric environment and narrations. You will play the role of a man who ends up on a mysterious island. Strong elements of Lovecraftian horror, struggle to survive in an unknown world.
Presented with a Lovecraftian style, As players dive deeper and deeper into the mystery, they'll face overwhelming odds. It's only by mastering the artifacts of the old gods combat mechanic that they can stay one step ahead of the darkness that tries to swallow the world of his, but will that be enough?

name: ForeVR Darts
description: Experience Oculus’ latest Hand Tracking technology in the perfect game to play with your hands: darts! Stock your arsenal with a selection of 50+ uniquely weighted darts with custom effects and attributes, featuring a range of classic designs and fantastical flights. Explore 3 immersive darts halls and choose from 1000s of songs on the jukebox or stay tuned into each hall’s curated playlist. Get competitive with Double Out (501, 301) in public multiplayer or keep it casual with 501, 301, 201, and 101 modes in Single Player, Pass-and-Play, or a Private room with friends. Create or join public or private multiplayer rooms to face off against players all around the world. Create private multiplayer rooms to play against friends and family online or use Pass-and-Play to play with one headset locally. Prefer to play solo? Challenge in-game pro NPCs to hone your skills and level up. ForeVR Darts gets players’ hands-on VR like no other sports game can!

name: Gutsy the Guinea Pig
description: In a desperate attempt to regain their former glory, the cats of the Internet have hatched a devious plot to reinvigorate their icons of old. How will they do this? By stealing the life force of defenseless guinea pigs! Help Gutsy the Guinea Pig navigate a series of magnetic obstacles to retrieve the keys to his friends’ freedom.

name: Exo
description: An audiovisual exploratory game based on Gatekeeper's eponymous electronic studio album.

name: Goody Bad Heroes
description: Goody Bad Heroes is a side-scrolling fight action platformer for only 1 player.

name: Dear Agent
description: Dear Agent is an action game with some thinking involved. It plays similarly to a typical platform game. As an agent, your job is to complete several missions, all of which involve killing all enemies (both humans that walk around randomly, and beasts that breathe fire when up close) and destroying all objects on a level, then getting to the teleporter.

name: Phrased Out
description: A trivia story RPG for iOS and Android! Help BeepBoop and the Child battle their way through a gauntlet of trivia challenges, and unlock the mystery of their troubled planet.

name: Samurai Deeper Kyo
description: Samurai Deeper Kyo is a 2D versus fighting game based on the manga by Akimine Kamijō.

name: The Timeless Child
description:
The Timeless Child is a 2-player puzzle-adventure coop game with first-person view.

Start an exciting and engaging adventure, a tale about family, bonds and secrets. You will explore Wells Manor, an ancient 16th century villa full of history and secrets, living the experience from two different temporal perspectives.
Whether you decide to take on the role of Chris Hunt, a skilled hunter on call, or Emily Wells, a child trapped in the past, you'll need to collaborate with your partner to solve puzzles that require cooperation and logic to be completed.

Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey to the borders of time and space to save Emily from her time captivity?

name: Miku no 2048
description: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Get to the 2048 tile, and reach a high score!

name: Stuck in Time
description: A unique mix of adventure and idle game. Plan and optimise your loops carefully and let the grind happen automatically. Explore this unique world, meet strange characters and escape the loop. A high-quality idle game that elevate the mechanics through an old school pixel-art adventure.

name: Sphaze
description: Find the path through labyrinths! Sphaze is a sci-fi puzzle game with beautiful vivid art created by an indie team from Poland! In Sphaze, you will manipulate impossible mazes and guide mysterious robots through stunningly beautiful worlds. Sphaze is a relaxing exploration through fantasy and sci-fi worlds. Guide the mysterious robots through different areas, solving arcade puzzles, challenging your reflex, and helping the energetic RoBeep.

name: You Are Hope
description: You Are Hope is a game where the emphasis is on the need to collaborate peacefully with other players in order to survive and evolve. Your task is to rebuild civilization from scratch, together with other players and across countless generations.

name: Bitburner
description: Bitburner is a programming-based incremental game. Write scripts in JavaScript to automate gameplay, learn skills, play minigames, solve puzzles, and more in this cyberpunk text-based incremental RPG.

name: Fractal Fighter
description: Fractal Fighter is a shooting game, where the player's spaceship engages several large enemy ships in one-on-one combat. The enemy ships resemble a branching fractal; they are made of a core, out of which branch out several large lasers; out of the tip of every laser branch out several heat-seeking missile launchers, which further branch out into triple guns, and finally small weak guns.

name: The Design
description: The Design is a shooting game where the player simultaneously controls two circles, yellow and green, which can be freely moved in four directions around the screen. They can also shoot bullets outwards, along the line on which both circles lie.

name: Holey Hell
description: Try to stay alive as you run and jump deeper and deeper into the Holey Hell.

name: Skate or Don't!
description: Skate or Don't! is a massively multiplayer online arcade game.

name: Age Archives: 20th Box Edition
description:
Including the Bonus Story from Kimi ga Nozomu Eien ~Latest Edition~ named "Kanashimi wa Kaze no you ni" & 4 Bonus Titles.
Contains Vocal & Soundtrack CDs, 20th Anniversary Celebration Illustration Art, Fan Club Newsletter, Title Booklet & Sticker Set.

Age Maniax ~Isumi Yon Shimai Saigo no Hi~, Anonymous, Kaseki no Uta, Kimi ga Ita, Kisetsu ~Primary~, Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, Kimi ga Nozomu Eien Another Episode –, Kanashimi wa Kaze no Youni, Kimi ga Nozomu Eien ~Special Fan Disc~, Muv-Luv, Muv-Luv Altered Fable, Muv-Luv Alternative, Muv-Luv Alternative – Total Eclipse, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.1, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.2, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.3, Muv-Luv Alternative Chronicles Vol.4, Muv-Luv Photonflowers*, Owarinaki Natsu, Towa Naru Shirabe, Pikopiko ~Koisuru Kimochi no Nemuru Basho~, Rasen Kairou, Rasen Kairou 2, Schwarzesmarken and Shapeshifter.

name: Circus Electrique
description: Circus Electrique is part story-driven RPG, part tactics, part circus management, and completely enthralling - all with a steampunk twist. When everyday Londoners mysteriously turn into vicious killers, only the show's talented performers possess the skills necessary to save the city.

name: The Forge Arena
description: The Forge is the first tactical FPS competitive video game utilizing the blockchain through non-fungible tokens or NFTs. Aimed to be the first Esport in the Metaverse, The Forge offers a unique and personalized 5v5 experience where all players start out on the same playing field. Players use NFT Generators to create, collect, use, sell and trade in-game NFT cosmetics for their weapons, attachments, and avatars. Spark, the in-game currency is gained by players from simply playing the game and is collected through the battle pass, loot boxes, community giveaways and, exclusive tournaments. Generators and Spark are combined to create the unique and rare NFTs that bring The Forge to life.

name: Mortal Kombat: Solano Edition
description: It is a good edition and compilation of several old school MKs with classic characters, stages, music and even brings editions of characters of the new MKs of current consoles and edits of characters not seen before

name: International Basketball Manager 22
description: Become the best basketball coach of the moment with International Basketball Manager 2022. Take your team to the pinnacle of the sport by managing all its day-to-day affairs with the seemingly endless array of management tools that the game offers you. Your team’s results will depend on you. Can you handle the pressure?

name: Too Many Santas!
description: A Christmas wish come true, or a holiday nightmare? The Santa Claus dating sim you can play all year round!

name: Food Flinger VR
description: The patrons are hungry, so feed them! Huck food at their faces to graciously serve them... in VR! Grab their tips, prep for the next wave, and do it all over again! Can you survive to Wave 99?

name: Tower of Gargax
description: Solve puzzles as you ascend a tower, encountering magic and monsters along the way.

name: Space Docker VR
description: A “Newtonian physics” space-flight simulator for VR! Get in the cockpit, pilot a spacecraft, navigate hazardous environments, and compete with your friends to become the ultimate docker!

name: Aliisha: The Oblivion of Twin Goddesses
description: Play solo or team up with a friend and guide twin sisters Aisha and Lisha through a mysterious temple in the beautiful fantasy adventure Aliisha: The Oblivion of Twin Goddesses. In the game, Aisha and Lisha will be controlled in their own distinctive way, so that the players will enjoy the playing experience exclusive to themselves. Both players not only have to brainstorm to solve puzzles, but they also need to move around to pass one level and another in the ruins.

name: Afterlove EP
description: Afterlove EP is a slice-of-life adventure about love, loss and music. Explore modern Jakarta as Rama in his journey to learn about himself, create music, find love and come to terms with the loss of his girlfriend Cinta, whose voice still lives on in his head.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games
description: Wouldn’t it be great if we could play board games online even if we couldn’t meet in person? With Let's Play! Oink Games, you can play Oink Games' titles, Deep Sea Adventure, A Fake Artist Goes to New York, and more on your gaming console. You can play at home with your family, online with your friends, or test your skills against CPUs. Plenty of ways to play!

name: Baby Storm
description: Baby Storm is a cooperative party game. Watch over unpredictable kids as they unleash chaos in your kindergarten! Maintain order, run, clean and feed your way to the highest score, in solo or up to 4 players!

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter
description: When the snow stops falling, the small Danish village of Tinglev will no longer be the same. Walk the path of Gerda as her quiet life is turned upside down during the World War 2 occupation of her home. Choose where to go, how to act, and who to trust in this intimate narrative RPG-lite experience inspired by real life events. How far would you go to protect your loved ones?

name: Xiao Xiao No. 9: Fight Man
description: Xiao Xiao 9 is part of the Xiao Xiao Flash series. It is a short beat 'em up in the vein of Final Fight, where a black stickman must traverse the animator's desk, beating up purple stickmen along the way. The hero has several attacks available: a regular punch or kick, a flying kick, a throw, and a roundhouse kick which knocks down all nearby enemies but costs a part of the hero's life bar. After making it through several fights, the hero climbs on top of the artist's computer to confront the final boss who has multiple health bars.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
description: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is a remake that will draw from the rich canvas of the brand. The game will be rebuilt from the ground up using Ubisoft's own Snowdrop engine to deliver new-generation visuals and gameplay, and the dynamic lighting and shadows the series is known for.

name: Turtle Head: Unmasked
description: A remake of the game Turtle Head (Originially by Pikasprey) created by Team Meatpie.

name: Sleepy Sheep
description: Welcome to the Dream World! Follow our protagonist Nicole Armatti as she gets to explore a place completely built off her own subconscious. Meet friends, foes, and explore a plethora of colorful settings as Nicole travels deeper and deeper into her own dreams.

name: There Will Be No Turkey This Christmas
description: Christmas is coming, and your goal is to spoil it! After all, you are the turkey! Hide in the barrel so you won't be seen by your enemies. Be stealthy! You are escaping, after all. Seek the keys to make your way to freedom and escape all 7 members of the Silva family. Pass through hidden tunnels in the house so the enemies do not see you! Collect items to make new skins available. Take on the 30 levels and win the challenge of not becoming a roast turkey.

name: Project Bore
description: Project bore is a Psychological-Horror RPG is about the story of a man trying to fight himself and his inner demons. Project Bore takes you through seven handcrafted levels with their own tailor-made songs. Project Bore was made as a sort of experiment on how a new approach on the traditional turn-based could lead to a different yet exciting experience.

name: Gloom Reducer
description: A wandering game with two endings.

name: State: Burial
description: A reflection on burial, made the day after the Duke of the region I was homeless in was buried in state.

name: 8-Bit Adv Steins;Gate
description: Experience the city of Akihabara completely re-imagined in an 8-bit world and solve mysteries as Okarin! When Okarin and his friends made the "Phonewave", they had no idea it would have the ability to send emails to the past and, as a result, change the present. Tragedy strikes as an organization behind a global conspiracy seeks to obtain their invention and threaten the fate of humanity! But even when the outcome changes, their fate ends in disaster time and time again... Faced with overwhelming despair, which future will Okarin choose? Change the past to save the future!

name: Picross S7
description: The seventh entry in the Picross S series adds more puzzles in the same familiar model, with the addition of touchscreen controls.

name: RedCat
description: This is the first game in the Redcat series. In this game you play as Redcat, who sets out to retrieve the stolen national treasure from the mice. The game has 10 levels in total. In these levels you will be killing different kinds of mice with your sword, bombs, a machine gun or a flamethrower. You will also be picking up money on your way to the final level, which will make your score go up. There are a number of traps set up throughout the levels as well, like spike pits and blocks that will crush you.

name: Chrysalis
description:
Defend your Chrysalis from growing hordes of monsters in this hybrid game that combines elements of tower defense, survival, and roguelike RPGs. Explore procedurally generated levels, possess and control animals, and grow deadly gardens. How far can you get before the next wave of monsters attacks?

In Chrysalis, you play the role of an incorporeal Wisp tasked with defending a magical Chrysalis from the forces of disease, dark magic, and death. The Wisp cannot physically interact with the world, but it can draw power from the natural world and inhabit animals and plants. Using these powers, the Wisp must explore the world and use what it finds to defend the Chrysalis at all costs.

name: Lapis Re:Lights
description: Lapis Re:LiGHTs is a Japanese RPG social simulation game launched in 2021. In this game you are the teacher and educate witch high school girls.

name: Wibble Wobble Multiplayer
description:
It's a wibbly wobbly world for four friends.

Collect stars to boost your score multiplier, jump on top of dead players to revive them, avoid hazards, stay alive and get a high score.

name: Pinball FX
description: Discover brand new exclusive tables created for Pinball FX, or find your favorites among more than 40 unique and visually enhanced favorites from Zen's extensive digital pinball library. Relive the most iconic moments from entertainment powerhouses like Indiana Jones, Star Wars, Marvel, Universal Studios, and many more. Enjoy accurate re-creations of the most famous pinball machines of all time with Williams Pinball, or have fun with Zen’s original creations.

name: Totally Spies! Mall Brawl
description: A lot of malls across the whole globe have been recently discovered that they cannot control their prices anymore in Totally Spies! Mall Brawl game! Investigations have been made, and it turns out that all of this is happening due to Tim Scam, who designed this scheme so he can achieve more customers for his online store! His plan, apparently, is to become one of the wealthiest men on the planet! You need to help out Clover, Sam, and Alex to fight against Tim's scheme, and let the malls get back to their daily business!

name: Teen Titans One-on-One
description: The Teen Titans have another mission to accomplish in the Teen Titans One on One Game. Each of the villains that the Teen Titans have ever faced has come up with some evil plans. You will need to stop each one of them from achieving the goals that they have in mind. Do you think you can do it? One-on-One consists of 5 minigames using various input methods (mouse or keyboard).

name: Disney Melee Mania
description: Disney Melee Mania is a 3v3 arena brawler video game featuring Disney and Pixar characters. Each champion will appear in a distinct action-ready design equipped with their own set of iconic moves and unlockable

name: Five Nights at Sonic's Maniac Mania
description: Five Nights at Sonic's Maniac Mania is fan game made by SmilerFurcifier/PyroTheRapidFox, it is based of FNaF and it is a UCN.

name: Room Smash
description: Room Smash is a casual sandbox physics simulator with a variety of rooms and weapons to simulate destruction.

name: Halloween Chronicles: Monsters Among Us
description: Do you have what it takes to save the town from an army of Halloween monsters before it’s too late?

name: Halloween Chronicles: Monsters Among Us - Collector's Edition
description: Do you have what it takes to save the town from an army of Halloween monsters before it’s too late?

name: Bit of War
description: An 8-Bit demake of God of War, this game is a love letter to both the series itself as well as old school gaming in general.

name: Você é um Defunto Mecânico
description: Você é um Defunto Mecânico is a short interactive fiction game about a deceased mechanic remembering how he died, and the tortured lives that are now left behind.

name: Life in Willowdale: Farm Adventures
description:
Welcome to Willowdale, your life of farming and adventure starts here!
The once thriving town of Willowdale is in ruins! The mayor’s business minded daughter Penny has seized the opportunity to transport this once pleasant place into a high-flying modern tourist destination. She doesn’t really like animals and thinks keeping livestock is dirty especially when you can import all these products easily from a nearby town. With humans and nature so out of balance… some of the animals felt abandoned and have already left. Is it too late to stop the changes set in motion by her?

Your uncle, mayor Moneybags calls for your help. Return to your family’s farm to help restore harmony between the people and nature! It is time to light the way for the lost people of the town by reigniting their passion and helping them appreciate the beauty of Willowdale!

name: Doctor Who: Worlds Apart
description: Doctor Who: Worlds Apart is a fast-paced trading card game set in the wide universe of the official Doctor Who series. Players create decks of cards made up of a wide variety of characters, items and phenomena and use these to do battle with opponents. Establish yourself as supreme with a Dalek-dominated deck or mix it up with a combination of Doctors and Cybermen, the choice is yours. All card artwork has been hand-drawn by our talented artists and approved by our official partners, the BBC.

name: Void Frame
description: Void Frame is a 2d platformer. Move,jump and dash ,through various sorts and varieties items, completed one and after levels,meet final boss and defeaut it.

name: Resist
description: Resist is a single-player action RPG designed exclusively for Quest. With a kinetic swinging system, intense combat, and a fully immersive story, Resist is the VR experience you’ve been waiting for.

name: Bouncy Bunnies
description: Race against your friends in a colorful platform world. Take the boost to run faster or find the shortest path to be the first bunny to reach the goal. Choose between 8 different levels. Collect carrots to get higher score!

name: Holy Moly
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyberpunk Runner
description:
Cyberpunk Runner is a personalized endless runner with exciting Realtime commentary & one of a kind third person shooter twist.

Run, Jump & Dodge through the Sci-Fi, Cyberpunk Themed city as Cyber Robots block your path & attempt to assassinate you. Use your navigation skills to dash as far as you can, shoot Cyber Robots & blast Hover cars flying in your way to make new records.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation S.T.A.R.T.U.P.
description:
EMERGENCY ALERT! Security has beeen breached at the secret treehouse headquarters of the Kids Next Door. Help the KND complete Operation: S.T.A.R.T.U.P. to defend the Treehouse and defuse the threat. Good luck!

Operation S.T.A.R.T.U.P. is an adventure game consisting of five separate levels, each focusing on one of the members of Sector V and a villain related to them.

name: The Great Circle
description: The Great Circle is an open world animal survival experience set in an African wildlife preserve.

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Ice Creamed
description: Ice Creamed is an action game starring Numbuh 2 on the Cartoon Network website. The Ice Cream Men have kidnapped Numbuh 3, Numbuh 4, and Numbuh 5! Numbuh 2, not armed but equipped with his F.L.A.P.P.U.H., must rescue them from a crazy ice cream factory!

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Numbuh Generator
description: Create your own character and make them a part of the Kids Next Door team! In this game, you can create an agent and then, after you're done and click generate, you will see him in action. Choose and change the agent's body parts until he looks exactly how you want.

name: Cartoon Network: Trick or Treat Beat!
description: It is Halloween! Time to scare people and demand sweets! Choose a character and together with a character from Cartoon Networks go to people's houses to demand candies! Collect as many candies as you can. The more candies you collect, the more points you will get!

name: Codename: Kids Next Door - Operation T.R.I.C.K. or T.R.E.A.T.
description: The goal is to get all candies and money and, if possible, the bonus coin. You change costumes and KND can give you money. Be sure to watch your surroundings. Costumes are varied, and have different uses.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Iron & Flame
description: Iron and Flame was a Fullmetal Alchemist flash game formerly hosted on the [adult swim] website. The player was able to control both Edward and Alphonse Elric, who were sent by Roy Mustang to destroy the last of Shou Tucker's remaining chimeras.

name: Delusion
description:
Delusion is a short horror game inspired by Granny for mobile devices Android.

Short Description about Delusion:

Someday you driving to your new job late at night.
After a long road, your car is out of gas but you find in the forest an old abandoned house. When you reach a door something hits your back.
Then you wake up in this house and you are not alone here.

name: InuYasha: Demon Tournament
description: InuYasha Demon Tournament is a RPG strategy game featuring the characters from InuYasha. Participate in the demon tournament to win the shikon jewel, which is a powerful artifact that will grant great power to whomever attain it. Gather all the shards of the shikon jewel by defeating each opponents. You must use your courage and strategy to outwit your enemies on the battlefield, or the jewel will be lost for you.

name: Dexter's Laser Lab
description: Dee Dee just used Dexter's lab for her birthday party. Now it's time to clean up. Place mirrors and use Dex's TidyTron 4000 laser to blast the party balloons in Laser Lab.

name: Mending Wall
description: A game inspired by a poem, and intended for two players—but playable solo.

name: PhasR
description: Survive the treacherous tubular highway, dodging grey blocks and phasing through colored ones. You may go far, but the road is endless...

name: All Hams on Deck!
description: Bounce that ham! 50+ pigs to acquire! Aim for the highest score you can!

name: Dungeonblade: Haunted Kingdom
description: A text adventure game where you explore a "living" dungeon, defeating otherworldly beasts and avoiding deadly traps on a journey to discover the legendary Golden Coins and defeat the Necromancer.

name: Toy Kingdom 2
description:
Fast-paced, relentless first-person combat sandbox game full of magic and dinosaurs in a 3D procedural generated world.

Play as an action figure that has landed in a mysterious world. Gain the ability to harness the power of lightning, fight back against hordes of Velociraptors and other deadly creatures. Play your own way, at your own pace. Collect all the protons to win!

name: O o o
description: Air hockey but you control both players. Keep the puck from touching bad stuff to rack up points!
